competitors.name: Paycom
competitors.notes: Primary competitor in mid-market cloud HCM

competitors.name: ADP
competitors.notes: Market leader with Workforce Now for mid-market

competitors.name: Paychex
competitors.notes: Major payroll and HR services provider

competitors.name: UKG
competitors.notes: Formed from Ultimate Software and Kronos merger in 2020

context: In 2020, Paylocity competed with Paycom as the primary mid-market cloud HCM rival. The Ultimate Software-Kronos merger creating UKG reshaped the HCM competitive landscape. The pandemic accelerated cloud HCM adoption as organizations needed remote workforce management. Paylocity differentiated with community collaboration features and user experience focus. Competition intensified from both traditional players (ADP, Paychex) and newer cloud-native platforms.
